prompts.article_summary:
Analyze this article and provide:
1. A brief summary (2-3 sentences)
2. The main category (choose from: Politics, Business/Economy, Technology, Science/Health, Sports, Entertainment, Crime/Law, International, US News, Environment, Education, Other)
3. Key facts or data points mentioned

Format your response as:
SUMMARY: [your summary]
CATEGORY: [category name]
KEY POINTS: [bullet points]
